pageContext.claim: “This directive calls on the Secretary of Defense to develop a legislative proposal that will establish the structure and authority of the Space Force as the sixth branch of the United States Armed Forces.”
pageContext.analysis: The new Space Force proposal calls for the creation of a new branch of service within the Air Force Department, complete with a four-star general joining the Joint Chiefs of Staff. But it is smaller than the Space Force plan Trump originally conceived, which also called for a separate Department of the Space that would have been led by an appointed service secretary. It also still requires the approval of Congress.
